testsuite.name: Dissertation Tests

testcase.name: new dissertation duplicated
testcase.failure:
Assertion failed:
assert article != null | | null false
at DissertacaoSteps$_run_closure10.doCall(DissertacaoSteps.groovy:59) at ✽.Given the system has a dissertation entitled "Nova Dissertacao"(Dissertacao.feature:8)

testcase.name: new dissertation
testcase.failure:
Assertion failed:
assert dissertation != null | | null false
at DissertacaoSteps$_run_closure12.doCall(DissertacaoSteps.groovy:69) at ✽.Then the dissertation "Dissertacao Teste2" is properly stored by the system(Dissertacao.feature:20)

testcase.name: edit dissertation

title ==~ /Ver Dissertação/ | | | false Dissertação Listagem

testsuite.system-out:
@i9n Feature: Dissertation Tests As a member of a research group I want to add, remove and modify dissertations I have added
--Output from new dissertation duplicated-- Scenario: new dissertation duplicated # Dissertacao.feature:7 Given the system has a dissertation entitled "Nova Dissertacao" # DissertacaoSteps.groovy:57 Assertion failed:
assert article != null | | null false
at org.codehaus.groovy.runtime.InvokerHelper.assertFailed(InvokerHelper.java:386) at org.codehaus.groovy.runtime.ScriptBytecodeAdapter.assertFailed(ScriptBytecodeAdapter.java:658) at DissertacaoSteps$_run_closure10.doCall(DissertacaoSteps.groovy:59) at ?.Given the system has a dissertation entitled "Nova Dissertacao"(Dissertacao.feature:8)
When I create the dissertation "Nova Dissertacao" with file name "teste6Dissertacao.pdf" and school "UFPE" # DissertacaoSteps.groovy:62 Then the dissertation "Nova Dissertacao" is not stored twice # DissertacaoSteps.groovy:72
--Output from new dissertation without school-- Scenario: new dissertation without school # Dissertacao.feature:12 Given the system has no dissertation entitled "Dissertacao Teste3" # DissertacaoSteps.groovy:52 When I create the dissertation "Dissertacao Teste3" with file name "teste3Dissertacao.pdf" without school # DissertacaoSteps.groovy:78 Then the system has no dissertation entitled "Dissertacao Teste3" # DissertacaoSteps.groovy:52
--Output from new dissertation-- Scenario: new dissertation # Dissertacao.feature:17 Given the system has no dissertation entitled "Dissertacao Teste2" # DissertacaoSteps.groovy:52 When I create the dissertation "Dissertacao Teste2" with file name "teste2.pdf" and school "UFPE" # DissertacaoSteps.groovy:62 Then the dissertation "Dissertacao Teste2" is properly stored by the system # DissertacaoSteps.groovy:67 Assertion failed:
assert dissertation != null | | null false
at org.codehaus.groovy.runtime.InvokerHelper.assertFailed(InvokerHelper.java:386) at org.codehaus.groovy.runtime.ScriptBytecodeAdapter.assertFailed(ScriptBytecodeAdapter.java:658) at DissertacaoSteps$_run_closure12.doCall(DissertacaoSteps.groovy:69) at ?.Then the dissertation "Dissertacao Teste2" is properly stored by the system(Dissertacao.feature:20)
--Output from new dissertation without file-- Scenario: new dissertation without file # Dissertacao.feature:22 ENTROU no signIn Enabled == trueENTROU NO TRYJefferson Almeida Given I am at the publications menu # CommonSteps.groovy:6 When I select the "Dissertacao" option at the program menu # DissertacaoSteps.groovy:12 And I select the new dissertation option at the dissertation page # DissertacaoSteps.groovy:16 And I cant add the dissertation without a file # DissertacaoSteps.groovy:21 Then the system has no dissertation entitled "Dissertacao Teste 1" # DissertacaoSteps.groovy:52
--Output from edit dissertation-- Scenario: edit dissertation # Dissertacao.feature:29 ENTROU no signIn Enabled == trueENTROU NO TRYJefferson Almeida Given I am at the publications menu # CommonSteps.groovy:6 When I select the "Dissertacao" option at the program menu # DissertacaoSteps.groovy:12 And I select "Nova Dissertacao" at the dissertation page # DissertacaoSteps.groovy:28 And I click on edit # DissertacaoSteps.groovy:33 Assertion failed:
title ==~ /Ver Dissertação/ | | | false Dissertação Listagem
